mn127:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn127:2.1: Atha kho pancakango thapati annataram purisam amantesi:
mn127:2.2: “ehi tvam, ambho purisa, yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena ayasmato anuruddhassa pade sirasa vandahi:
mn127:2.3: ‘pancakango, bhante, thapati ayasmato anuruddhassa pade sirasa vandati’ti;
mn127:2.5: ‘adhivasetu kira, bhante, ayasma anuruddho pancakangassa thapatissa svatanaya attacatuttho bhattam;
mn127:2.6: yena ca kira, bhante, ayasma anuruddho pagevataram agaccheyya;
mn127:2.7: pancakango, bhante, thapati bahukicco bahukaraniyo rajakaraniyena’”ti.
mn127:2.8: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so puriso pancakangassa thapatissa patissutva yenayasma anuruddho tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anuruddham abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so puriso ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
mn127:2.9: “pancakango, bhante, thapati ayasmato anuruddhassa pade sirasa vandati, evanca vadeti:
mn127:2.10: ‘adhivasetu kira, bhante, ayasma anuruddho pancakangassa thapatissa svatanaya attacatuttho bhattam;
mn127:2.11: yena ca kira, bhante, ayasma anuruddho pagevataram agaccheyya;
mn127:2.12: pancakango, bhante, thapati bahukicco bahukaraniyo rajakaraniyena’”ti.
mn127:3.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho tassa rattiya accayena pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena pancakangassa thapatissa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
mn127:3.2: Atha kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam anuruddham panitena khadaniyena bhojaniyena sahattha santappesi sampavaresi.
mn127:3.3: Atha kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam anuruddham bhuttavim onitapattapanim annataram nicam asanam gahetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn127:3.4: Ekamantam nisinno kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
mn127:4.1: “Idha mam, bhante, thera bhikkhu upasankamitva evamahamsu:
mn127:4.5: Ya cayam, bhante, appamana cetovimutti ya ca mahaggata cetovimutti—
mn127:4.6: ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca, udahu ekattha byanjanameva nanan”ti?
mn127:5.1: “Tena hi, gahapati, tamyevettha patibhatu, apannakante ito bhavissati”ti.
mn127:5.3: ‘ya cayam appamana cetovimutti ya ca mahaggata cetovimutti ime dhamma ekattha byanjanameva nanan’”ti.
mn127:6.1: “Ya cayam, gahapati, appamana cetovimutti ya ca mahaggata cetovimutti ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca.
mn127:6.2: Tadaminapetam, gahapati, pariyayena veditabbam yatha ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca.
mn127:7.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam tatha tatiyam tatha catuttham; iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharati.
mn127:7.5: upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam tatha tatiyam tatha catuttham; iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam upekkhasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyabajjhena pharitva viharati.
mn127:8.2: Idha, gahapati, bhikkhu yavata ekam rukkhamulam mahaggatanti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:8.4: Idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va rukkhamulani mahaggatanti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:8.6: Idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yavata ekam gamakkhettam mahaggatanti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:8.8: Idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va gamakkhettani mahaggatanti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:8.10: Idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yavata ekam maharajjam mahaggatanti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:8.12: Idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va maharajjani mahaggatanti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:8.14: Idha pana, gahapati, bhikkhu yavata samuddapariyantam pathavim mahaggatanti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:8.16: Imina kho etam, gahapati, pariyayena veditabbam yatha ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca.
mn127:9.3: Idha, gahapati, ekacco ‘parittabha’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:9.4: So kayassa bheda param marana parittabhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
mn127:9.5: Idha pana, gahapati, ekacco ‘appamanabha’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:9.6: So kayassa bheda param marana appamanabhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
mn127:9.7: Idha pana, gahapati, ekacco ‘sankilitthabha’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:9.8: So kayassa bheda param marana sankilitthabhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
mn127:9.9: Idha pana, gahapati, ekacco ‘parisuddhabha’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:9.10: So kayassa bheda param marana parisuddhabhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
mn127:10.1: Hoti kho so, gahapati, samayo, ya ta devata ekajjham sannipatanti, tasam ekajjham sannipatitanam vannananattanhi kho pannayati no ca abhananattam.
mn127:10.2: Seyyathapi, gahapati, puriso sambahulani telappadipani ekam gharam paveseyya.
mn127:10.3: Tesam ekam gharam pavesitanam accinanattanhi kho pannayetha, no ca abhananattam;
mn127:10.4: evameva kho, gahapati, hoti kho so samayo, ya ta devata ekajjham sannipatanti tasam ekajjham sannipatitanam vannananattanhi kho pannayati, no ca abhananattam.
mn127:11.1: Hoti kho so, gahapati, samayo, ya ta devata tato vipakkamanti, tasam tato vipakkamantinam vannananattanceva pannayati abhananattanca.
mn127:11.2: Seyyathapi, gahapati, puriso tani sambahulani telappadipani tamha ghara nihareyya.
mn127:11.3: Tesam tato nihatanam accinanattanceva pannayetha abhananattanca;
mn127:11.4: evameva kho, gahapati, hoti kho so samayo, ya ta devata tato vipakkamanti, tasam tato vipakkamantinam vannananattanceva pannayati abhananattanca.
mn127:12.1: Na kho, gahapati, tasam devatanam evam hoti:
mn127:12.2: ‘idam amhakam niccanti va dhuvanti va sassatanti va’, api ca yattha yattheva ta devata abhinivisanti tattha tattheva ta devata abhiramanti.
mn127:12.3: Seyyathapi, gahapati, makkhikanam kajena va pitakena va hariyamananam na evam hoti:
mn127:12.4: ‘idam amhakam niccanti va dhuvanti va sassatanti va’, api ca yattha yattheva ta makkhika abhinivisanti tattha tattheva ta makkhika abhiramanti;
mn127:12.5: evameva kho, gahapati, tasam devatanam na evam hoti:
mn127:12.6: ‘idam amhakam niccanti va dhuvanti va sassatanti va’, api ca yattha yattheva ta devata abhinivisanti tattha tattheva ta devata abhiramanti”ti.
mn127:13.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sabhiyo kaccano ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
mn127:13.3: Atthi ca me ettha uttarim patipucchitabbam.
mn127:13.4: Ya ta, bhante, devata abha sabba ta parittabha udahu santettha ekacca devata appamanabha”ti?
mn127:13.5: “Tadangena kho, avuso kaccana, santettha ekacca devata parittabha, santi panettha ekacca devata appamanabha”ti.
mn127:14.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante anuruddha, hetu ko paccayo yena tasam devatanam ekam devanikayam upapannanam santettha ekacca devata parittabha, santi panettha ekacca devata appamanabha”ti?
mn127:14.2: “Tena havuso kaccana, tamyevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
mn127:14.4: yvayam bhikkhu yavata ekam rukkhamulam ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati, yo cayam bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va rukkhamulani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.5: imasam ubhinnam cittabhavananam katama cittabhavana mahaggatatara”ti?
mn127:14.6: “Yvayam, bhante, bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va rukkhamulani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.9: yvayam bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va rukkhamulani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati, yo cayam bhikkhu yavata ekam gamakkhettam ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.10: imasam ubhinnam cittabhavananam katama cittabhavana mahaggatatara”ti?
mn127:14.11: “Yvayam, bhante, bhikkhu yavata ekam gamakkhettam ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.13: “Tam kim mannasi, avuso kaccana, yvayam bhikkhu yavata ekam gamakkhettam ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati, yo cayam bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va gamakkhettani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.14: imasam ubhinnam cittabhavananam katama cittabhavana mahaggatatara”ti?
mn127:14.15: “Yvayam, bhante, bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va gamakkhettani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.17: “Tam kim mannasi, avuso kaccana, yvayam bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va gamakkhettani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati, yo cayam bhikkhu yavata ekam maharajjam ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.18: imasam ubhinnam cittabhavananam katama cittabhavana mahaggatatara”ti?
mn127:14.19: “Yvayam, bhante, bhikkhu yavata ekam maharajjam ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.21: “Tam kim mannasi, avuso kaccana, yvayam bhikkhu yavata ekam maharajjam ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati, yo cayam bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va maharajjani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.22: imasam ubhinnam cittabhavananam katama cittabhavana mahaggatatara”ti?
mn127:14.23: “Yvayam, bhante, bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va maharajjani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.25: “Tam kim mannasi, avuso kaccana, yvayam bhikkhu yavata dve va tini va maharajjani ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati, yo cayam bhikkhu yavata samuddapariyantam pathavim ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.26: imasam ubhinnam cittabhavananam katama cittabhavana mahaggatatara”ti?
mn127:14.27: “Yvayam, bhante, bhikkhu yavata samuddapariyantam pathavim ‘mahaggatan’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati—
mn127:14.29: “Ayam kho, avuso kaccana, hetu ayam paccayo, yena tasam devatanam ekam devanikayam upapannanam santettha ekacca devata parittabha, santi panettha ekacca devata appamanabha”ti.
mn127:15.2: Atthi ca me ettha uttarim patipucchitabbam.
mn127:15.3: Yavata, bhante, devata abha sabba ta sankilitthabha udahu santettha ekacca devata parisuddhabha”ti?
mn127:15.4: “Tadangena kho, avuso kaccana, santettha ekacca devata sankilitthabha, santi panettha ekacca devata parisuddhabha”ti.
mn127:16.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, anuruddha, hetu ko paccayo, yena tasam devatanam ekam devanikayam upapannanam santettha ekacca devata sankilitthabha, santi panettha ekacca devata parisuddhabha”ti?
mn127:16.3: Upamayapidhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
mn127:16.4: Seyyathapi, avuso kaccana, telappadipassa jhayato telampi aparisuddham vattipi aparisuddha.
mn127:16.5: So telassapi aparisuddhatta vattiyapi aparisuddhatta andhandham viya jhayati;
mn127:16.6: evameva kho, avuso kaccana, idhekacco bhikkhu ‘sankilitthabha’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati,
mn127:16.7: tassa kayadutthullampi na suppatippassaddham hoti, thinamiddhampi na susamuhatam hoti, uddhaccakukkuccampi na suppativinitam hoti.
mn127:16.8: So kayadutthullassapi na suppatippassaddhatta thinamiddhassapi na susamuhatatta uddhaccakukkuccassapi na suppativinitatta andhandham viya jhayati.
mn127:16.9: So kayassa bheda param marana sankilitthabhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
mn127:16.10: Seyyathapi, avuso kaccana, telappadipassa jhayato telampi parisuddham vattipi parisuddha.
mn127:16.11: So telassapi parisuddhatta vattiyapi parisuddhatta na andhandham viya jhayati;
mn127:16.12: evameva kho, avuso kaccana, idhekacco bhikkhu ‘parisuddhabha’ti pharitva adhimuccitva viharati.
mn127:16.13: Tassa kayadutthullampi suppatippassaddham hoti, thinamiddhampi susamuhatam hoti, uddhaccakukkuccampi suppativinitam hoti.
mn127:16.14: So kayadutthullassapi suppatippassaddhatta thinamiddhassapi susamuhatatta uddhaccakukkuccassapi suppativinitatta na andhandham viya jhayati.
mn127:16.15: So kayassa bheda param marana parisuddhabhanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
mn127:16.16: Ayam kho, avuso kaccana, hetu ayam paccayo yena tasam devatanam ekam devanikayam upapannanam santettha ekacca devata sankilitthabha, santi panettha ekacca devata parisuddhabha”ti.
mn127:17.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sabhiyo kaccano ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
mn127:17.4: ‘evam me sutan’ti va ‘evam arahati bhavitun’ti va;
mn127:17.5: atha ca pana, bhante, ayasma anuruddho ‘evampi ta devata, itipi ta devata’tveva bhasati.
mn127:17.7: ‘addha ayasmata anuruddhena tahi devatahi saddhim sannivutthapubbanceva sallapitapubbanca sakaccha ca samapajjitapubba’”ti.
mn127:17.8: “Addha kho ayam, avuso kaccana, asajja upaniya vaca bhasita,
mn127:17.10: ‘digharattam kho me, avuso kaccana, tahi devatahi saddhim sannivutthapubbanceva sallapitapubbanca sakaccha ca samapajjitapubba’”ti.
mn127:18.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sabhiyo kaccano pancakangam thapatim etadavoca:
mn127:18.3: yam tvanceva tam kankhadhammam pahasi, mayancimam dhammapariyayam alatthamha savanaya”ti.
